siteMetadata.title: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.author: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.description: I am a developer, designer and product manager from France. Co-founder of Pixelnest Studio.

markdownRemark.html:
Jeff Atwood:

If I have learned anything in my programming career, it is this: building reusable software, truly reusable software, is an incredibly hard problem – right up there with naming things and cache invalidation.

excerptQuote.name: Jeff Atwood
